channel.title: Prerequisites on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Prerequisites on My New Hugo Site

item.title: VPC Details
item.description: Prerequisites VPC: SQL-POC Subnet: 10.0.0.0 / 16 Site1 subnet: 10.0.1.0/24 – eu-west-1a Site2 subnet: 10.0.2.0/24 – eu-west-1b

item.title: Create Managed AD
item.description: Create Managed AD for the domain authentication In this task, you will create a Managed AD Directory. Navigate to Directory Services and click "Set up directory" Type: Chose "AWS Managed Microsoft AD" And fill the details as following: - For the VPC and Subnet, please use the VPC provided in your account - Review: This can take up to 20-45 minutes.
